commit message:
Merge pull request #7 from M2ck/patch-1

Updated french translation
Refactoring: spring-cleaning. Many classes moved from flavors to main part. Removed dependency ShelockActionBar and introduced ToolBar/ActionBar.
Refactoring: tutorial is now a fragment

Spring Cleaning - Part 1
Refactoring:
- Merged common used classes
- Replaced ActionBarSherlock by Android Toolbar
- Fixed several Bugs in Routing
- Tutorial outsourced as fragment
- New Interfaces, e.g. for Locationer
- Added Fabric (Crashlytics and Answers) for playStore flavor
